title: A Vision of Murder
description: In this chilling mystery, murder is haunting a small southern town. Emily Walker is a psychic determined to solve the crimes. Her visions are exactly what the police need. But will the ghosts that haunt Emily be too much for her to take?Mrs. Dodd is the epitome of an older southern lady. She knows all the timeworn gossip and stories of her hometown. With her quick eye and love of mysteries, she is sure she can catch the murderer. The dark woods and old homes of Temple hold many secrets. In a place where the past and present interweave, will the killer be caught in time?
author: Price McNaughton
